comments.text:
I'm so sorry!:( stage fright can be a night mare.. Does your stage fright 
mainly consist of "what ifs..?" For me I use to drown my self with "what if 
I fall of the stage.."what if I forget line" what if I crack? " untill I 
started to do what I call "thinking the what ifs through" for instance.... 
"What if I forget a line.. Then I will do me best to recover and move on in 
life" after doin this I realized that there is nothing I can do on stage 
that will ruin my life for ever!!! Go to my channel and find the video "HOW 
I NEVER GET STAGE FRIGHT" to discover how I have compleatly destroyed my 
own stage fright through a list of simple easy tips!! Good luck!!❤️❤️
